Package com.dampcake.bencode

Class BencodeInputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.InputStream
java.io.FilterInputStream
com.dampcake.bencode.BencodeInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class BencodeInputStream extends FilterInputStream
InputStream for reading bencoded data.
Author:
Adam Peck

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BencodeInputStream(InputStream in)
    Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the UTF-8 Charset for decoding the data and coerces dictionary values to a String.
    BencodeInputStream(InputStream in, Charset charset)
    Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the Charset passed for decoding the data and coerces dictionary values to a String.
    BencodeInputStream(InputStream in, Charset charset, boolean useBytes)
    Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the Charset passed for decoding the data and boolean passed to control String parsing.

  • Constructor Details

    • BencodeInputStream

      public BencodeInputStream(InputStream in, Charset charset, boolean useBytes)
      Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the Charset passed for decoding the data and boolean passed to control String parsing. If useBytes is false, then dictionary values that contain byte string data will be coerced to a String. if useBytes is true, then dictionary values that contain byte string data will be coerced to a ByteBuffer.
      Parameters:
      in - the InputStream to read from
      charset - the Charset to use
      useBytes - controls coercion of dictionary values
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the Charset passed is null
      Since:
      1.3

    • BencodeInputStream

      public BencodeInputStream(InputStream in, Charset charset)
      Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the Charset passed for decoding the data and coerces dictionary values to a String.
      Parameters:
      in - the InputStream to read from
      charset - the Charset to use
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the Charset passed is null
      See Also:
      • BencodeInputStream(InputStream, Charset, boolean)

    • BencodeInputStream

      public BencodeInputStream(InputStream in)
      Creates a new BencodeInputStream that reads from the InputStream passed and uses the UTF-8 Charset for decoding the data and coerces dictionary values to a String.
      Parameters:
      in - the InputStream to read from
      See Also:
      • BencodeInputStream(InputStream, Charset, boolean)
